about_the_game:
In the far future, a mysterious ship has crashlanded on the edge of a desert wasteland. The promise of untold power awaits any driver with the muster to get there first and claim it for themselves! Blaze a trail across the outlands in this fast paced SHMUP - build your perfect arsenal and become unstoppable!


- 24 unlockable drivers - each with unique abilities and playstyles! Everything from muscle cars to junkers to UFOs and tanks.

- Over 40 base weapon types, all upgradeable into two different evolved forms - adding new functions, power or both!

- Choose your path along the way - a sprawling map with dozens of ways to reach the finish!

- Stop in at the garage to buy new weapons, adjust your attack patterns and hire passengers to increase your weapon functionality.

- Conquer huge bosses and threatening minibosses that get in your way.
detailed_description:

Blaze a trail across the outlands in this fast paced SHMUP - build your perfect arsenal and become unstoppable!


- 24 unlockable drivers - each with unique abilities and playstyles! Everything from muscle cars to junkers to UFOs and tanks.

- Over 40 base weapon types, all upgradeable into two different evolved forms - adding new functions, power or both!

- Choose your path along the way - a sprawling map with dozens of ways to reach the finish!

- Stop in at the garage to buy new weapons, adjust your attack patterns and hire passengers to increase your weapon functionality.

name: Highway Rampage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, GeForce 720,or Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Highway Rampage is a high speed, action packed SHMUP with tons of variety and replayability. Choose your vehicle, equip and upgrade new weapons and choose your path in this arcade style roguelite shoot em up.
